title: Shuuen no Shiori - Novel Updates
genre: Horror   Mystery   Psychological   School Life   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Based on a Song   Stalkers   Survival Game   Time Manipulation   Vocaloid
author: Suzumu
description: ――Due to a single traitor, the game has begun. Those that wish to escape must abide by the terms and reach the end. Now, let this fun Demise Game begin――' One-Man Hide and Seek, Doppelgangers, Mearry-san's Messages, Monkey's Hand .... A group of four boys and girls become involved with a certain game though the 'Bookmark of Demise,' a taboo that is said to have been brought back from ten years prior. Carry out the 'demand' written in the mysterious letter, and perform the urban legends. Otherwise, you will die. 'With that said, please look forward to the worst ever aftertaste.>
